name: Cartoon Cat Scary Siren Call
description:
Are you looking for scary voice and song to prank your friends? The Cartoon Scary Cat Application that provides the voice and video of famous cartoon cat monster, fictional character created by Trevor Henderson.

In this application, there are many things like cartoon cat voice Call and video and also Quiz Game for much more fun. Joke with your friends and scary them with these sounds in you phone.

And also have a texting conversation seen like it real to fan with your friends

Features:

- This app will allow you to receive a call from your favorite scary character : Cartoon Cat Dog and Siren head Horror.
- Fake live chat and live video calls.
- Cool and friendly Design of Scary Cartoon Cat.
- It’s a free and Easy app to use.
- have a texting conversation with Cartoon Cat.
- Quiz Game with many questions for challenge friends
- And Much more Fun.
- This application is perfect for Halloween

DISCLAIMER:
the app is designed to be as realistic as possible to help you pull-off a believable prank. You can't make a real call with Cartoon Cat.
So enjoy the app and give your friends and family a good scare.
